title: Righteous Obsession
description: The investigation into a deadly home invasion involving business owner Milton Sawyer takes a turn when an unlikely witness on the other side of the country comes forward. Dennis Murphy reports.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
